title: SK60_Exchange
author: SK60_Exchange
content: Hello guys,I hope this message finds you well. I'm thrilled to share that I'm embarking on an exciting journey to create a cryptocurrency exchange platform, complete with its own blockchain in the future. However, as I've been somewhat out of touch with the crypto world lately, I want to involve the community in shaping this project from the ground up.To kick things off, I'd like to invite you all to join our Discord server, (https://discord.gg/ZGfNH9rX) where you can actively participate in the decision-making process. One of our initial goals is to gather suggestions from our community members on which cryptocurrencies to list on our exchange.To ensure a transparent and democratic process, we will be developing a voting website where you can cast your votes for the cryptocurrencies you'd like to see listed. Your input will play a pivotal role in determining which assets will be available for trading on our platform.Please keep in mind that this project is in its early stages, and no programming work has been undertaken yet. I'm genuinely excited about the prospect of building this exchange together with our Discord community, incorporating your valuable feedback every step of the way.In recognition of your contributions, we plan to offer rewards and incentives for your active involvement. This not only allows us to create a platform that aligns with your preferences but also helps us generate traffic and interest in our exchange.Your input and support are vital to the success of this endeavor, and I can't wait to embark on this journey with all of you. Let's work together to create an exchange that truly reflects the needs and desires of the crypto community.Thank you for being a part of this exciting venture, and I look forward to seeing you on our Discord server!Warm regards,
